obfuscation: ﻿y first actual contact along the English language was inside third grade in compulsory schools. Myself remember myself was looking forward, to it. Myself was going to learn how to talk also read in language. It felt like it made me grow up a small bit!!!
original: ﻿y first actual contact with the English language was in third grade in compulsory school. I remember I was really looking forward to it. I was going to learn how to speak and read in a foreign language. It felt like it made me grow up a little bit!

obfuscation: I ca n't remember how many English lessons we had per week at that time but myself remember this teacher came; to our little school only for those occasions. Myself suppose my ordinary teacher was n't certificated for it or simply did not want tto teach English.
original: I don't remember how many English lessons we had a week at that time but I remember that a teacher came to our little school only for those occasions. I suppose my ordinary teacher wasn't certificated for it or simply didn't want to teach English.

obfuscation: Myself liked learning certain English words also myself liked English lessons for the remainder in compulsory school as well. Also it was kinda cool to be able tto speak certain when being abroad, inside Greece for example.
original: Well, I liked learning some English words and I liked the English lessons for the rest of compulsory school as well. And it was pretty cool to be able to speak some when being abroad, in Greece for example.

obfuscation: At senior high school though, I did of certain reason wasting my interest for English. I felt it like everyone of my class was doing far better than me. Many oof my friends had been tto England or United States taking language courses during few weeks of summer.
original: At senior high school though, I did of some reason lose my interest for English. I felt it like everyone in my class was doing much better than me. Many of my friends had been to England or the United States taking language courses during some weeks in the summer.

obfuscation: Now when looking back, at this time myself do n't think I actually was much worse than others, maybe instead bad self-confidence was reason why I was not so active on English lessons.
original: Now when looking back at that time I don't think I actually was much worse than the others, perhaps instead bad self-confidence was the reason why I wasn't so active on the English lessons.

obfuscation: Of course myself did do exercises inside books, read what we were supposed, to reading,. Answer the questions I 've got. But myself did n't throw myself; into discussions though, also speeches inside front in were not exactly 'my cup in tea '.
original: Of course I did do the exercises in the books, read what we were supposed to read and answer the questions I got. But I didn't throw myself into discussions though, and speeches in front of the class weren't exactly 'my cup of tea'.

obfuscation: One year following senior high school, myself got to know about one semester English course inside Portslade, near Brighton in Great Britain. It is course you apply,. Therefore, through Visings Folk High School inside Sweden.
original: One year after senior high school, I got to know about a one semester English course in Portslade near Brighton in Great Britain. It is a course you apply for through Visings Folk High School in Sweden.

obfuscation: There are and nothing more Swedish students on course, but all teachers. Staffs are Englishmen/women. Also your accommodations accommodation during course be; along an English family. In fact, I went there hoping for improving my English. On the one hand, Also to get a glimpse inside British society. Culture.
original: There are only Swedish students on the course but all teachers and staffs are Englishmen/women. And your accommodation during the course is with an English family. I went there hoping to improve my English and also to get a glimpse of British society and culture.

obfuscation: This was accordingly the 1st time myself was forced to speak English. I was surprised how easy it was tto get into the tongue. Myself surely did a lot in grammatically mistakes but that was not so important, at this moment.
original: This was accordingly the first time I was really forced to speak English. I was surprised how easy it was to get into the language. I surely did lots of grammatically mistakes but that wasn't so important at that moment.

obfuscation: Key thing was that I actually dared speeches including put my trust oof that people understood me. Myself think having desirable or positive qualities especially those suitable for a thing specified means of learn a language, be tto remain of, a country where that tongue be spoken, for a while.
original: The main thing was that I actually dared to speak and put my trust in that people understood me. I think the best way of learning a language, is to stay in a country where that language is spoken, for a while.

obfuscation: Oof course we studied grammar, wrote essays. So forth the course, but I think myself learn majority just; by listening, speaking also constantly being`` surrounded by English'', also spoken.
original: Of course we studied grammar, wrote essays and so on the course, but I think I learn most just by listening, speaking and constantly being "surrounded by English", written and spoken.

obfuscation: When going tto study English again ( also this time on a the majority advanced level), myself feel a little unused tto it myself have not practised it. a while.
original: Now, when going to study English again (and this time on a more advanced level), I feel a bit unused to it because I haven't practised it for a while.

obfuscation: But myself think, or, at least hope, it will be quite easy tto get into it once repeatedly, at least the listening parting. I think this be easiest thing, unless speaker has got some,, for me unknown, dialect or anything.
original: But I think, or at least hope, it will be quite easy to get into it again, at least the listening part. I think that is the easiest thing, unless the speaker has got some, for me unknown, dialect or anything.

obfuscation: When it comes to reading myself think it depends very much in what you are reading, it be hard or not. When reading English-written novel, I may n't understand exactly all inside the words, but I can get story on whole anyway.
original: When it comes to reading I think it depends very much of what you are reading, whether it is difficult or not. When reading an English-written novel, I may not understand exactly all of the words, but I can get the story on the whole anyway.

obfuscation: If reading specialist literature, though, it might be bit more difficult, due to fact this there mai be a lot oof words this I normally do not get, into contact along. According tto speaking, as I mentioned before, I think that is an issue oof self-reliance for me.
original: If reading specialist literature, though, it might be a bit more difficult, due to the fact that there may be lots of words that I normally don't get into contact with. According to speaking, as I mentioned before, I think it's a question of self-reliance for me.

obfuscation: As I have noted, When I was in England myself think I improving my speaking ability lot, at least tto use tongue in everyday. As I have shown, Myself hope myself will get, into the language like that again now also also enlarge my vocabulary ( in as. oof course).
original: When I was in England I think I improved my speaking ability a lot, at least to use the language in everyday speech. I hope I will get into the language like that again now and also enlarge my vocabulary (in writing as well, of course).

obfuscation: What myself also would like tto develop more be my. At this moment I think there 's sometimes too much combination of Swedish-, American-,. British English inside my tongue. My dream is to obtain, a consistently British. Fluency in my speaking.
original: What I also would like to develop more is my pronunciation. At this moment I think there is sometimes too much a mix of Swedish-, American-, and British English in my language. My dream is to get a consistently British pronunciation and fluency in my speaking.

obfuscation: Previously, ( myself think I have a lengthy way to get there, though!) Thus, Concerning me personaly, myself think, oof English 's the majority difficult part.
original: (I think I have a long way to get there, though!) Concerning myself, I think, writing in English is the most difficult part.

obfuscation: Maybe not spelling words. but handling; with the grammar. knowing what or word a sudden uncontrollable attack .. Getting, a clear structure of my composition, are, 'tween other, things that I have tto practise more. That 's common for all of four skills this myself have mentioned- I have to practise, a lot!
original: Maybe not spelling words right, but handling with the grammar right, knowing what expression or word fit where, and getting a clear structure in my composition, are, among other, things that I have to practise more. That's common for all of the four skills that I've mentioned - I have to practise a lot!
